page.shortlink: api error line number get function
page.description: Report the line that the error occured on.
page.discussion: Causes an error to occur and displays the Error description as the error text. ERROR_LINE_NUMBER_GET() returns the Line_Number of the command that caused the error in the script. You would generally use this command in the error handler portion of a script.

section.title: Example
section.description: Use this error handling routine to display the error message script name, and line number any run-time error that occurs.
section.example: error_handler: err_msg = error_text_get(error_code_get() ) line = error_line_number_get() script = error_script_get() ui_msg_box("Error", err_msg + " Error occurred at line " + alltrim( str(line, 4, 0) ) + "in script: " + script) RESUME NEXT
